Pittsburgh.Greater Pittsburgh: Greater Pittsburgh is a major metropolitan area in the United States which is centered on the City of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania but includes 12 counties in the states of Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and Ohio and was officially defined by the U.S. Census Bureau as the Pittsburgh-New Castle-Weirton combined statistical area (CSA) in 2013. As a CSA, the Census Bureau has identified that the region shares integrated transportation and economic ties as evidenced by commuting patterns. The estimated population of the area was 2,635,228 in mid-2016.
